title: Lower Priority Queue
body:
My entire town's power got cut off for about 5-10 mins and I got back into my game straight away but I still got put in the lower priority queue and have to wait 20 mins to get in a game. 

Now I have 5 lower priority queues and I want to know if I can at least get the time reduced because I didn't know the power was going to go out.

replies.body:
Unfortunately not, sorry. LPQ is a bit stricter in Ranked environments; however, the punishment is pretty low if you haven't left any games recently. If you've left games recently, it generally escalates with each leave. You can read more information about LeaverBuster and LPQ here:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ

Let me know if you have any questions!
